name: Bunker 58
description: Locked inside of Bunker 58 with major threats surrounding you, you question yourself how much you value your life, and how much you will kill to keep it.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
